name: WP Chat
author: Abhinav Singh

sections.description:
Jaxl IM is a simple easy to use communicator for websites with Instant Messaging, Social Networking and Sharing capabilities.

  1. No hardware/software pre-requisite required
  2. Compatible with all websites and frameworks
  3. Setup by simple copy/paste of javascript code
  4. Hosted dashboard for site admins and visitors
  5. Customize look and feel using various skins
  6. Enhance chat experience using plugins
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin
  2. Extract the plugin into /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin, visit ‘WP Chat’ settings page for customization
sections.changelog:
0.0.3

Embed code goes inside page footer (wp themes should implement wp_footer action)
Updated plugin to reflect beta release of Jaxl IM

0.0.2

Updated embed code (instead of jaxl.php, jaxl.js is now embedded, required for cache purposes)
Updated plugin to disable multiple embed of widget on same blog page

0.0.1

First version of WP Chat

short_description: WP Chat embeds Jaxl IM which is a simple easy to use communicator for websites with Instant Messaging, Social Networking and Sharing capabilities.
